work.name: American Red Cross
work.summary: Developed a web application to help the American Red Cross to manage their emergency stations

work.name: St. Mary's Engineering Department
work.summary: Mentored, directed, and guided students throughout a summer program, teaching them the principles of robotics.

work.name: St. Mary's Learning Assistance Center
work.summary: Instructed and guided students in programming and physics courses, helping them to understand complex concepts and improve their grades.

education.institution: St.Mary's University, San Antonio, TX, USA
St.Mary's University, San Antonio, TX, USA

publications.name: GazeViz: A Web-Based Approach for Visualizing Learner Gaze Patterns in Online Educational Environment
publications.summary: Developed a web-based approach for visualizing learner gaze patterns in online educational environments, focusing on browser integration, dashboard design, and scalable eye-tracking visualization.

publications.name: 3D Gaze Tracking for Studying Collaborative Interactions in Mixed-Reality Environments
publications.summary: Developed computational pipeline leveraging from off-the-shelf computer vision algorithms to perform 3D gaze tracking in mixed-reality environments.

publications.name: Multimodal Methods for Analyzing Learning and Training Environments: A Systematic Literature Review
publications.summary: Conducted a systematic literature review on multimodal methods for analyzing learning and training environments, contributing to the understanding of advanced analytical techniques in educational settings.

publications.name: A First Step Using Machine Learning Methods to Enhance Interaction Analysis for Embodied Learning Environments
publications.summary: Developed AI techniques and software tools to analyze multimodal data from embodied learning environments involving the interaction analysis.

publications.name: Monocular Microscope to CT Registration using Pose Estimation of the Incus for Augmented Reality Cochlear Implant Surgery
publications.summary: Developed a computational pipeline leveraging from off-the-shelf computer vision algorithms to perform 3D gaze tracking in mixed-reality environments.

publications.name: ChimeraPy: A Scientific Distributed Streaming Framework for Real-time Multimodal Data Retrieval and Processing
publications.summary: Created a multimedia data processing framework for real-time data retrieval and processing in distributed environments.

publications.name: Identifying Gaze Behavior Evolution via Temporal Fully-Weighted Scanpath Graphs
publications.summary: Identified gaze-based behaviors along the temporal dimension through the use of graphs involving fixated objects in a mixed-reality environment.

publications.name: Prediction of Students' Self-confidence Using Multimodal Features in an Experiential Nurse Training Environment
publications.summary: Developed predictive models using multimodal data (eye gaze and speech patterns) to accurately predict students' self-rated confidence in simulation-based nurse training environments.

publications.name: A Tale of Two Nurses: Studying Groupwork in Nurse Training by Analyzing Taskwork Roles, Social Interactions, and Self-Efficacy
publications.summary: Analyzed a mixed-reality, simulation-based training exercise involving three nurses, performing multimodal interaction analysis to contrast strategies used when patients expressed doubts about their care. Demonstrated connections among nurses' clinical roles, self-efficacy, and teamwork.

publications.name: Using the DiCoT framework for integrated multimodal analysis in mixed-reality training environments
publications.summary: Developed a computational pipeline leveraging from off-the-shelf computer vision algorithms to perform 3D gaze tracking in mixed-reality environments.

publications.name: Adaptive Scaffolding to Support Strategic Learning in an Open-Ended Learning Environment
publications.summary: Developed an adaptive scaffolding framework for Betty's Brain, an open-ended learning-by-teaching environment. The framework includes an online strategy detector and a conversational adaptive feedback mechanism to support students' strategic learning. Conducted a pilot study with undergraduate students, analyzing activity logs, interactions, and eye-gaze patterns to infer learning behaviors and performance.

projects.name: RedForest
projects.summary: EdTech Platform, empowered by AI and multimodal learning analytics

projects.name: ChimeraPy: A Scientific Distributed Streaming Framework for Real-time Multimodal Data Retrieval and Processing
projects.summary: ChimeraPy is a multimedia data processing framework for real-time data retrieval and processing in distributed environments.

projects.name: SKORE (Smart Keyboard Operated by Robotic Educator)
projects.summary: SKORE is a piano tutor capable of teaching music theory and piano playing to students of all ages.
